means: 消除，彻底征募，彻底搜查

sentence.Network_en: Why don't you go comb out Princess Sparkle's tail.
sentence.Network_cn: 你干嘛不上楼给闪闪公主梳梳尾巴?

sentence.Network_en: This is a new technique to comb out drug users.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是找出吸毒者的新方法.

sentence.Network_en: They ran to her and pulled the comb out of her hair.
sentence.Network_cn: 便跑过去把梳子从她的头发上拔下来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 搜查-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 非法搜查 bag job 彻底搜查 comb-out 搜查人员 boarding party.

list.abs: the undesirable soldiers were combed out by the commander ., 指挥官把不符合要求的士兵都清除出去了.
英语词汇新译 C_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... comatulid 海百合 comb out 彻底查出 comb 梳子.
hold - 英汉词典 ... give out 耗尽 comb out 淘汰 kick out 逐出.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of removing tangles from you hair with a comb
2. the act of carefully weeding out unwanted things or people;
